task.name: appendantab
task.shortdescription: Append syscal and gaincurve data from an antab file
task.description: Provide an MS created from a fitsidi file using importfitsidi and an antab file associated with that data. This task will parse the antab file file and fill the MS SYSCAL and GAIN_CURVE subtables based on the information in the antab file.

param.name: vis
param.description:
Name of input visibility file Default: none
Example: vis='ngc5921.ms'

param.name: outvis
param.description:
Name of output visibility file. If the file name specified already exists it will be replaced Default: none
Example: caltable='ngc5921.ms'

param.name: antab
param.shortdescription: Name of the input antab file
param.description:
Name of antab file to append info from Default: none
Example: caltable='bc246b.antab'

param.name: overwrite
param.description: Allows the outvis file to be overwritten Default: False

param.name: append_tsys
param.description: Use the information from the antab file to create and fill the SYSCAL subtable Default: True

param.name: append_gc
param.description: Use the information from the antab file to create and fill the GAIN_CURVE subtable Default: True

task.example:
